/* 자동 증가 컬럼 쿼리 */
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) < 1 THEN '${tableName}_1' ELSE CONCAT('${tableName}_',MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(${tableName}_code,'_',-1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) END AS increase_code FROM ${tableName}

/* 상품 등급 목록 쿼리 */
